bibl.title: A New Early Christian Poem on the Sacrifice of Isaac.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: P. Bodmer XXX. - Introduction. - Text in translation. - Comments. - 1. Abraham is willing and he rejoices. - 2. Abraham tries to convince Sara. - 3. Sara puts heart into Isaac. - 4. Isaac is willing and he rejoices. - 5. Isaac regards the sacrifice as a wedding. - 6. Around the flames the Red Sea roars. - 7. God's hand holds Abraham back. - 6. A goat / apple as fruit in the tree serves as an alternative. - Conclusions.
